document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">News </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">feel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">travelling </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">News </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Heart </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Alighting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Dwelling </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">'Twill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">enter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Dart! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">News </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">think </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">pondering </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">News </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Thought </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Concerning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">stupendousness </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">perceiveless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">freight! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">News </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Man </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">comprehend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Universe </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">thing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">remain? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: How news must feel when travelling
